mapper.select: SELECT A.bno, A.uno, A.bcd, A.btitle, A.bctnt, A.bidx, A.bord , A.bdept, A.brdt , B.unm as writer , (SELECT COUNT(D.bno) FROM t_board_recommendation AS D WHERE D.bno = A.bno AND rec = 1) AS rec FROM t_board as A INNER JOIN t_board_notice as C ON A.bno = C.bno LEFT JOIN t_user as B ON A.uno = B.uno where A.bdel = 0 AND A.bcd > 1 AND A.bcd = #{bcd} ORDER BY A.bidx desc, A.bord asc
